name: facebook-ads-insights-raw
description: Raw performance data from Facebook Marketing API Insights endpoint (v24.0). Contains campaign, ad set, and ad-level metrics for UA and remarketing campaigns. One row per date + level + breakdown combination.

schema.name: facebook_ads_insights_raw
schema.description: Raw daily performance data from Facebook Ads API (v24.0). One row per date + level + breakdown combination.

properties.name: date_stop
properties.description: The end date for your data. This is controlled by the date range you've selected for your reporting view.

properties.name: date_start
properties.description: The start date for your data. This is controlled by the date range you've selected for your reporting view.

properties.name: account_id
properties.description: The ID number of your ad account, which groups your advertising activity.

properties.name: account_name
properties.description: The name of your ad account.

properties.name: campaign_id
properties.description: The unique ID number of the ad campaign you're viewing in reporting.

properties.name: campaign_name
properties.description: The name of the ad campaign you're viewing in reporting.

properties.name: adset_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the ad set you're viewing in reporting.

properties.name: adset_name
properties.description: The name of the ad set you're viewing in reporting.

properties.name: ad_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the ad you're viewing in reporting.

properties.name: ad_name
properties.description: The name of the ad you're viewing in reporting.

properties.name: impressions
properties.description: The number of times your ads were on screen.

quality.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {object} WHERE CAST({property} AS BIGINT) < 0

properties.name: clicks
properties.description: The number of clicks on your ads.

quality.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {object} WHERE CAST({property} AS BIGINT) < 0

properties.name: spend
properties.description: The estimated total amount of money you've spent on your campaign, ad set or ad during its schedule.

quality.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {object} WHERE CAST({property} AS DOUBLE) < 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {object} WHERE CAST({property} AS DOUBLE) > 100000

properties.name: objective
properties.description: The objective reflecting the goal you want to achieve with your advertising.

properties.name: reach
properties.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that saw your ads at least once.

properties.name: inline_post_engagement
properties.description: The total number of actions that Accounts Center accounts take involving your ads.

properties.name: cost_per_inline_post_engagement
properties.description: The average cost of each inline post engagement.
